summary: Standalone plugin for adding many of the missing weapons in Skyrim Redone using Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition and Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons.  Includes Elven, Glass, Ebony, Dragonbone varieties of Tantos, Wakizashis, Katanas, and Nodachis.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=3]A PerMa version of this mod is now available: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60073/]PerMa Weaponry Fillout[/url][/size][/color][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZYuQOvl.png[/img][/center]

[center][size=5][color=red]This is a standalone plugin for Skyrim Redone v1.0+ You do not need to (and should not) install the mods this plugin uses (Wot3e MoS or Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons).[/color][/size][/center]

[center][color=yellow]While not required, it is still recommended you run the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467/]ReProccer[/url] to balance these weapons, they do have the proper SkyRe tags but your ReProccer stats may be different then mine.[/color][/center]

[color=yellow]Requires SkyRe 1.0+ and in turn, Dawnguard and Dragonborn[/color]

[color=red]If you like this mod please remember to endorse [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892/]Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10171/]Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons[/url] as well.[/color]

[b][u]What does this plugin contain?[/u][/b]
SkyRe gave us a deep merge of various weapons and armor packs and updated perk trees for these weapons. Unfortunately there was quite a large gap in the light weaponry tree when using Tanto's, Wakizashi's, and Katana's (and in the Heavy Tree Nodachi's) with the left side of the smithing branch. You were with forced to either loot/buy a Daedric quality weapon, grab all the heavy (right-side) smithing perks to forge a Daedric one, or concede to Silver quality weapons in the middle.

This mod fills out many of the missing gaps in materials using a combined set of models and textures from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892/]Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10171/]Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons[/url] all pre-balanced and fully-integrated for Skyyim Redone. The complete list of weapons included in this pack follows:

* Elven Tanto
* Elven Wakizashi
* Elven Katana
* Elven Nodachi
* Glass Tanto
* Glass Wakizashi
* Glass Katana
* Glass Nodachi
* Ebony Tanto
* Ebony Wakizashi
* Ebony Katana
* Ebony Nodachi
* Dragonbone Tanto
* Dragonbone Wakizashi (Special note: this was created by scaling the Katana in Nifskope)
* Dragonbone Katana
* Dragonbone Nodachi
* Dragonbone Shortsword

I've also edited some of the leveled lists in SkyRe so some of these weapons should pop up in the SkyRe universe.

[color=yellow]Closing Thoughts[/color]
This is a pretty simple mod, I created it since it wasn't very clean to install the entirety of Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition and Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons. It created a lot of crafting clutter and duplicate recipes which my slightly anal-retentive self has issues with. I also found it quite easy to make a Dragonbone Wakizashi by scaling Wulfharths Katana model down which kept the lists tidy, and also straight up adding the Dragonbone Shortsword as well by him to SkyRe.

I am NOT a model creator though so all credit must be given to masterofshadows and Wulfharth for this plugin. I'd love to also expand this plugin to fill out more of the missing gaps in SkyRe; things like Scimitar's, Spears, Mauls, etc. but it beyond my abilities to create them. If you have any suggestions of other mods that might work and can put me in contact with their mod authors I'd be happy to think about adding them to this pack.

Thanks!
author: tortugapir8
